thread.title: Society6, Uber Bring Mobile Pop-up Art Gallery to Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Society6, Uber Bring Mobile Pop-up Art Gallery to Los Angeles

author: admin
title: Society6, Uber Bring Mobile Pop-up Art Gallery to Los Angeles
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/24/2015 @ 8:00 AM   Society6 
LOS ANGELES -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Society6 and Uber , leading innovators in the on-demand economy, are teaming up this Saturday to bring a mobile pop-up art gallery to Angelinos across the city. A 40’ long cargo container that’s been transformed into a highly polished rolling gallery will display large format paintings from eight different Los Angeles-area Uber driver-partners and Society6 artists. 
In true on-demand style, L.A. residents can use their Uber app to request info on nearby stops for the mobile gallery, tour it, and visit Society6 to purchase goods customized with art work from the featured artists, all of whom are supported in their pursuit of creative and professional freedom by Society6 or Uber. 
Visitors and riders will be treated to refreshments and free gear , such as totes and phone cases that Society6 has customized with the featured artists’ works. Los Angeles artist Cam Floyd will ride with the gallery and create art on-the-go, and world-renown photographer and Uber driver-partner Nitin Vadukul will capture the day’s events on camera. What: A mobile pop-up art gallery experience that empowers artists (and drivers) and connects Angelinos with breakout artists, and a special collection of work from Society6 and Uber driver-partner artists. When and Where: Saturday, October 24. 10:30am - 12:30pm @ The Victorian (2640 Main St. Santa Monica)2:30pm - 4:30pm @ The Unique Space (1275 E 6th St. Los Angeles)6:30pm - 8:30pm @ Space1520 (1520 N Cahuenga Blvd. Los Angeles)OR L.A. residents may request the mobile pop-up art gallery through the Uber app , or Follow @Society6 and @Uber_LA to get updates on where to see this ultimate art experience in action. Social specs: Whether near or far, check out #S6RollsOut and #UberARTIST to follow the action. 
About Society6 
Society6 , an online marketplace that provides artists a place to connect with consumers and sell their art, customizes products for buyers by printing artists’ works on dozens of items, ranging from tapestries to pillows to shower curtains. The artwork on Society6 is created by hundreds of thousands of artists from around the world, all of whom are empowered by Society6 to profit from the sale of their artwork, without giving up control of their rights.
